T=long(raw_input())
while T>0:
    N=long(raw_input())
    B=[-1]
    B=B*N
    A=map(long,raw_input().split())
    A.sort()
    K=N-1
    L=0
    i=0
    while i<N:
        if(i&1):
            B[i]=A[K]
            K-=1
        else:
            B[i]=A[L]
            L+=1
        i=i+1
    print ' '.join(map(str,B))
    T=T-1
